website_summaries.verdict: A good selection for the child who wants to join the big kids out flying.
pros: Durable red and green LED lights for indoor and outdoor use
Only 5 inches by 5 inches, so it can be used indoors
Charge time is 20 minutes for a flight of 5 to 6 minutes
Comes with USB charging cable, propeller guard and spare blades
cons: Battery is internal, so you can't buy extras and must charge after every flight

customer_reviews.title: First nano hex?
customer_reviews.text: This could possibly be the very first nano hexacopter to hit the market! And on top of that, it flies great! It also has nice LEDs for night flying. It banks well, does funnels and is very fast! I would say, the only downside to this multirotor is its tiny transmitter. Prop guard is removable. I did find one controller that works better with it ;) Edit : Spoke with someone from top race and he informed me that the next batch of this nano hex will be paired with a better, larger controller controller! Frequent Flyer
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Resilient
customer_reviews.text: Great little drone! I actually use these things to play with my dogs. They love to jump and try to bop them out of the air with their noses. This drone has held up much longer than many others. The rotor guards easily bend back into place whenever it takes a whack. It moves pretty quickly in fast mode, giving the dogs a good chase, and is very easy to keep under control. My only complaint is that when in headless mode, the controller beeps constantly. The beeping is shrill and ear piercing, and there is no way to make it stop. I don’t use headless mode because of this. Otherwise, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: eMKay

customer_reviews.title: Alot of value and unique design for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great hexcopter, super quality and flying ability... Now shipping with an updated transmitter. Had some initial problems that the seller Toprace quickly corrected with a personal private phone call to my home to make sure I was happy. I couldn't be more pleased. I give this hexocopter and Toprace a 100 % approval rating. AWESOME company and copter. Buy from them with total confidence in top quality and customer care. Good job guys !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first hexacopter, and it is awesome! Very fast and responsive.. very fast. Flies great indoors or out and is super durable. The prop guards are very sturdy...excellent! This quad maneuvers flawlessly, and the flips are tight. Pleasantly surprised.. I recommend this one...love it!!
customer_reviews.author: ChasT

customer_reviews.title: The best indoor drone in the price range
customer_reviews.text: extremely stable and well built, very fun to fly and fast as hell on mode 3. The fact that it comes with prop guards and silicone bumpers on the bottom for landing combined with how easy this drone is to control just makes it that much easier to take care of, especially if youre a new flyer and crash a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Batcheller

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Product came and boxing was nice but battery does not hold a charge. Drone also doesn’t fly in a straight line. Without even crashing out any hard landings a motor went out after only flying for aboht 29 seconds (battery is bad) BUYER BEWAREP
customer_reviews.author: Arkitek

customer_reviews.title: Review from a real person
customer_reviews.text: Only first day learning how to use it but so far it's pretty cool. A little smaller than I thought but the power it has definitely makes up for the size. The instructions that came with don't say how long to charge it for only says don't charge over an hour so I'm guessing on the time of charge to give it. Other than that this UFO is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: great fun for the price recommend for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: great fun for the price recommend for a beginner. It is very stable and easy to fly. battery only lasted about 40 days but still great price. was a great beginner one. battery is not removable. great range
customer_reviews.author: T&M

customer_reviews.title: ... losses altitude when in sweeping turns but overall is fun and
customer_reviews.text: drone does strange things when in advanced mode and losses altitude when in sweeping turns but overall is fun and fast
customer_reviews.author: Mcgruder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hexacopter if it had a better controller
customer_reviews.author: michael allen emerson

customer_reviews.title: this is a GREAT nano hexacopter second one i have bought
customer_reviews.text: this is a GREAT nano hexacopter second one i have bought, i have around 65+ flights on my first one!
customer_reviews.author: dwayne winstead

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew and he loved it. He crashed it so many times and it still works fine. Best for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: SJVV

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: A nice drone to learn with. My family and I have all used it to have fun around the house. Fly's nice, easy to learn, never had a problem with it. Would buy this again. My brother-in-law bought one as soon as he flew mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The maneuverability and ease of control were much better than any drone I've used before
customer_reviews.text: It surpassed my expectations. The maneuverability and ease of control were much better than any drone I've used before. I will definitely buy more drones made by Top Race
customer_reviews.author: steven henkel

customer_reviews.title: Flies great when connected
customer_reviews.text: Constantly loses connection with the hexacoptor causing crashing and damage. Flies great when connected, but doesn't last. Will not recommend this toy when there are so many better alternatives out there.
customer_reviews.author: Haiamirite

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved it when it works. Problem is it only worked for 2 days and then would not charge.
customer_reviews.author: James Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Defective Hexacopter
customer_reviews.text: The Hexacopter fly's great until you lose directional control and then it just drifts in one direction until you kill the throttle. Almost lost it because it drifted into a backyard full of dogs!! Luckily the owner was able to get it before the dogs did. Might want to wait until a newer version comes out to get this Hexacopter!!!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeJunky

customer_reviews.title: I receive this item broken and it is not worth ...
customer_reviews.text: I receive this item broken and it is not worth my time to get it fixes. I did not get to see this item by it being in my hands to look as in intereast to it and the pictures given here are not realistic and so mislading I can also say you can buy things here that are misleading and in my case just junk
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: an the controler not much good, go with the revell model
customer_reviews.text: This thing is to hev, an the controler not much good , go with the revell model
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I was a fan of remote controlled toys ever since I was a kid. I was facinated with drones when I saw a commercial of them delivering items to people, I opted to purchased this one since its very affordable. This drone is easy to control, the remote control is functional too, and I had fun playing it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: I was going through some mechanics of this when I saw it. Motors have equal amount of lifting force and together they create the harmony of motion. It never fails and works flawlessly even today. I'm glad that this lasted this long without getting any problems. It sure continues to excute me
customer_reviews.author: cassandra ganatos

customer_reviews.title: Every little boy should have one
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a helicopter like daddy’s but we didn’t want to make that kind of investment with him being only 5 and we all know kids break toys, I came across this one and was impressed at the design and this has 6 propellers. It files in all directions tumbles and can do stunts; the controller is shaped like a video gamer controller and fits perfectly in his little hands. When it came and he realized it was his helicopter he was thrilled, now him and daddy can fly together.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This mini hexacopter is adorable. It has a flawless performance and the flying power is remarkable. It flies up to a good height and the overall control is just great. It is strongly built and very well constructed. I have no issues/complaints with it and I play with it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Varvari

customer_reviews.title: Epic hex
customer_reviews.text: THIS DRONE IS AMAZING. It is like a u.f.o at night. I found a charger and battery to go with the first two so I get 20 min. of flight time:-)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks so badass
customer_reviews.text: The look is a lot better than the normal quadcopters. This looks like a real UFO anad you can pull of a prank at one of your friends who is into alien hunting stuff. I can't forget the fun i had when I woke my buddy who is all about UFOs, showed him this hexacopter which was actually a little above the roof while controlling it without even using my eyes and saying there was a distant UFO somewhere. He video taped the whole thing and we managed to capture his disappointment when me and my friends shared the little secret of the prank
customer_reviews.author: Richard

product_meta.title: Top Race Hexacopter Drone UFO 4 Channel 5 inch Quadcopter 2.4GHz 6-Axis Gyro TR-MQ6 - Colors Vary; Red or Blue
product_meta.description: The Top Race TR-MQ6 is not just another quad copter drone, its a Hexacopter Drone with its unique UFO design with a size of only 5X5 inches. You'l be amazed with it's shape and design. The Top Race Nano Hexacopter Drone; TR-MQ6 is very well built, made out of metal and hard durable plastic easy to fly With 3 Speed Mode Options High speed, Normal speed, and Low speed, for indoor and outdoor use. This Mini Drone also has the ability to fly with Mode 2 or Mode 4 (which changes the spin and directional sticks), Controlling distance is About 65 Feet, with this Mini Drone you can perform Flips 3D stunt flying. Charge time is about 15 min. for a 6-7 min. flight. The TR-MQ6 is a "All included ready to fly helicopter" it's dimensions are 5X5X1 inch with a 2.4GHz Transmitter and it's dimensions are 5X3X1.5 inches a USB Charging Cable, Spare blades, Propeller Guard, propeller Pick tool, Manual are also included. Top Race gives a 60 Day Warranty included with this product. Enjoy Your Flight!
feature_bullets: Top Race 4 Channel Mini Drone Hexacopter UFO 5 Inch Quadcopter 2.4GHz 6-Axis Gyro TR-MQ6
Unique Quadcopter Design; 6 Separate Motors, Extremely Durable with Strong Red and Green Led Lights for Indoor and Outdoor Use.
Full Movement: Ascend/Descend, Forward/Backward, Left/Right Rotation, Left/Right Drifting, Hovering. 3D tumbling action
Hexacopter Size: Only 5 in. Long by 5 in. Wide, Charge time is about 20 min. for a 5-6 min. Flight.
All included ready to fly, TR-MQ6, 2.4GHz Transmitter, USB Charging Cable, Spare blades, Propeller Guard, propeller Pick tool, Manual.
